transcript: my dad's buddy was in private Wealth Management in Maryland but he called me up and was like hey you should sell for me I said ah sales I'm not a Salesman I'm an academic and then lo and behold I signed my lease I slept on the floor and I was like how do I pay rent woman walks in the door and I was like I need to get her to give me money so I can pay rent so for me it was just begging people to give me money in the beginning like I promise I'm going to give you the best results ever but I thought it was beneath me I thought it was scammy and then I threw exposure I realized that it was something that I've really fallen in love with
